items.title: 2 Amazon Delivery Drones Crashed Into a Crane, and Now the FAA and NTSB Are Involved
items.description: Drone incidents like Amazon’s remain rare, and experts are researching ways to prevent collisions.

items.title: Why Some Companies Adopting AI May Be Running Before They Can Walk
items.description: If you’re rolling out AI to your workers and expecting them to use it, training them first is critical.

items.title: Are Your Employees Using AI to Create Fake Expense Receipts?
items.description: Growing evidence indicates employees are using AI apps to generate authentic-looking fake bills to submit as expenses.

items.title: How Brands Are Cashing In on Taylor Swift’s ‘The Life of a Showgirl’ Hype
items.description: Businesses are plugging into the singer’s latest album to win over the Swiftie fandom.

items.title: Tesla Is Facing a Lawsuit Over a Potential Design Flaw and Fatal Crash
items.description: The lawsuit alleges that a college student killed in a Tesla crash was trapped in a burning Cybertruck because of an issue with the doors.
